Dorothy Akinyi Ooko bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe ike na ọkachamara na teknụzụ.
A mụrụ ya na Mater Hospital, Nairobi, Ọ gara Fort Hall Road Primary School n'obodo ya wee gaa Pangani Girls High School maka ọkwa "O" ya wee gụchaa ọkwa "A" ya na Alliance Girls 'High School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọkwa "A", ọ gara Université de Haute Bretagne na France, ebe ọ gụrụ Lettres Modernes tupu ọ gbanwee gaa Asụsụ Bekee
Ọ laghachiri Kenya wee gụọ Bachelor of Education (French na English in Literature) site na 1985-1988
Ọ kụziri na Mukumu Girls' maka obere oge wee nweta agụmakwụkwọ iji mee Masters na French na Mahadum Kenya
O nwekwara Masters na International Business Administration na United States International University (USIU).
Ooko bụ onye njikwa nkwukọrịta, East na Francophone Africa maka Google nke dị na Nairobi. Tupu nke ahụ, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Nokia na Nairobi.
Ooko bu ụzọ mee ngagharị iwe maka iwepụ ụtụ isi bara uru (VAT) na ekwentị mkpanaaka na Kenya
Dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu Nokia East na Southern Africa, ya na ndị otu LG, Safaricom na ndị na-ekesa aka.
